text: vidakulu rendu sarle! A tarvata (bharyanu) sahrdayanto tama vadda undanivvali, leda amenu mancitananto saganampali. Mariyu saganampetappudu miru varikiccina vati nundi emaina tirigi tisukovadam dharmasam'matam kadu. Allah vidhincina haddulaku kattubadi undalemu ane bhayam a iddariki unte tappa! Kani allah vidhincina haddulaku kattubadi undalemane bhayam a dampatulaku unte stri pariharamicci (vidakulu/ khula tisukante) andulo variki elanti dosam ledu. Ivi allah vidhincina haddulu, kavuna vitini atikramincakandi. Mariyu evaraite allah vidhincina haddulanu atikramistaro, alanti vare durmargulu
